member.name: T:ImageResizer.Plugins.SimpleFilters.SimpleFilters
member.summary: This plugin provides grayscale, sepia, brightness, saturation, contrast, inversion, and alpha filtering options. It also includes beta support for rounded corners.

member.name: M:ImageResizer.Plugins.SimpleFilters.SimpleFilters.Install(ImageResizer.Configuration.Config)
member.summary: Adds the plugin to the given configuration container

member.name: M:ImageResizer.Plugins.SimpleFilters.SimpleFilters.Uninstall(ImageResizer.Configuration.Config)
member.summary: Removes the plugin from the given configuration container

member.name: M:ImageResizer.Plugins.SimpleFilters.SimpleFilters.GetSupportedQuerystringKeys
member.summary: Returns the querystrings command keys supported by this plugin.
